ps aux| grep firefox
minhvu1+  1902  2.7  7.9 2499060 312144 tty2   Sl+  08:58   1:15 /usr/lib/firefox/firefox -new-window
minhvu1+  1965  0.2  4.8 2063192 191624 tty2   Sl+  08:58   0:07 /usr/lib/firefox/firefox -contentproc -childID 1 -isForBrowser -intPrefs 5:50|6:-1|18:0|28:1000|34:20|35:5|36:10|45:128|46:10000|51:0|53:400|54:1|55:0|56:0|61:0|62:120|63:120|98:2|99:1|114:5000|124:0|126:0|137:10000|162:24|163:32768|165:0|166:0|174:5|178:1048576|179:100|180:5000|182:600|183:4|184:1|193:3|206:60000| -boolPrefs 1:0|2:0|4:0|26:1|27:1|30:0|33:1|37:1|38:0|39:0|40:0|43:1|44:1|47:0|48:0|49:0|50:0|52:0|57:1|58:1|59:0|60:1|64:1|65:1|66:0|67:1|68:1|69:0|70:1|73:0|74:0|77:1|78:1|82:1|83:1|84:0|85:0|86:0|88:0|89:0|90:1|91:0|92:1|95:1|97:0|100:1|101:0|108:0|113:0|116:0|118:1|119:1|121:1|125:0|127:0|129:0|131:1|132:1|138:1|139:0|140:1|142:0|153:1|160:0|161:0|164:1|167:0|169:1|171:1|172:0|177:0|181:1|186:0|187:0|188:0|189:1|190:0|191:1|192:1|195:1|198

ps -o nlwp 1965
